Uses of Class
ch.phonon.drawables.DrawableScaleReference

  • Packages that use DrawableScaleReference 
    Package Description
    ch.phonon  
    ch.phonon.temview  

    • Uses of DrawableScaleReference in ch.phonon

      Methods in ch.phonon that return DrawableScaleReference 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      DrawableScaleReference Scales.chooseScale(java.awt.geom.Point2D.Double actualMousePosition)
      This method chooses a scale in finding the first that is reflected by the delivered mouse position in TEMView coordinates.
      DrawableScaleReference Scales.getChosenScale()
      After chosing a scale by mouse pointer (see this Scales.chooseScale(java.awt.geom.Point2D.Double) the chosen state is changed.
      Methods in ch.phonon that return types with arguments of type DrawableScaleReference 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.util.Iterator<DrawableScaleReference> Scales.iterator()
      The Scales value class is an Iterable.

    • Uses of DrawableScaleReference in ch.phonon.temview

      Methods in ch.phonon.temview that return DrawableScaleReference 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      DrawableScaleReference TEMView.chooseScale(java.awt.geom.Point2D.Double actualMousePosition)
      This delegated method chooses a scale in finding the first that is reflected by the delivered mouse position in TEMView coordinates.
      DrawableScaleReference TEMView.getChosenScale()
      This legated method After chosing a scale by mouse pointer (see this TEMView.chooseScale(java.awt.geom.Point2D.Double) the chosen state is changed.
